nodes.text: The Void of Chopani was a location in the Chopani sector. Prior to Operation Buckler, the Alliance to Restore the Republic employed a subterfuge tactic in order to mask the presence of Alliance forces near the Void of Chopani. Tibbs Ospe, a scout for the Commerce Guild, flew a Vangaard Pathfinder out beyond the Void of Chopani when he discovered the planet Vandor.
